compatibility.notes: The AGPL-1.0-or-later license is a copyleft license that requires any derived works to be distributed under the same or compatible license. This means that if you distribute software that uses AGPL-1.0-or-later licensed code, you must also make available the source code for your software and any modifications you made.

key_requirements: Maintain the same license terms and conditions for derivative works.
Make source code available for modifications and distribute them under this License.
Notify users about any changes made to the software when distributing or publishing it.
license.name: AGPL-1.0-or-later
obligations: Distribute copies of the software and/or its derivative works under this License.
Make available the source code or have it available for distribution without fee.
Provide a copy of this License with each copy, or make it accessible via a publicly visible link.
Notify users that they are receiving a modified version of the software.
